routes.name: U.S. Nuclear Outages
routes.description:
Nuclear outages daily with capacity, outages, and percent outage.  
        Source:   Nuclear Regulatory Commission's Power Reactor Status Report.  
        Interactive data report:  Daily Status of Nuclear Reactors.

routes.name: Generator Level Nuclear Outages
routes.description:
Generator level nuclear outages with capacity, outages, and percent outage.  
        Source:   Nuclear Regulatory Commission's Power Reactor Status Report.  
        Interactive data report:  Daily Status of Nuclear Reactors.

routes.name: Facility Level Nuclear Outages
routes.description:
Facility level nuclear outages with capacity, outages, and percent outage.  
        Source:   Nuclear Regulatory Commission's Power Reactor Status Report.  
        Interactive data report:  Daily Status of Nuclear Reactors.
